description.en:
Han Jae-hwa is a writer who is attracts attention due to his delicate looks and excellent writings. After a few days of being stalked, he decides to hire a bodyguard, Seong Tae-kyung.  
  
As the stalking continue to escalate, Tae-kyung proposes an idea…!
description.fr:
: ||  
Han Jae-hwa est un écrivain qui attire l'attention grâce à son apparence délicate et ses excellentes écritures. Après des jours de harcèlement, il décide d'engager un garde du corps, Seong Tae-kyung.  
  
Alors que le harcèlement continue à s'intensifier, Tae-kyung lui propose une idée… !||

altTitles.tr: Seraph of the End: Kıyamet Meleği

altTitles.pl: Seraph of the End: Serafin Dni Ostatnich

altTitles.en: Seraph of the End: Vampire Reign

description.en: One day, a mysterious virus appeared on Earth which killed every infected human over the age of 13. At the same time, vampires emerged from the world's dark recesses and enslaved mankind. Enter Hyakuya Yuuichirou, a young boy, who along with the rest of the children from his orphanage, are treated as livestock by the vampires. Even in captivity, Yuuichirou dreams big. He dreams of killing vampires. He dreams of killing them all.
description.ru:
В стремлении к запретным знаниям «человек разумный» опять напортачил — в 2012 году на волю вырвался смертельный вирус, начавший косить человечество. Умирали почему-то взрослые, и тут, откуда ни возьмись, явились вампиры и согнали оставшихся детей в свой подземный город, объявив, что отныне «людишки» будут жить под защитой клыкастых хозяев, расплачиваясь кровью. Резкий парень Юитиро пожил так 4 года и понял, что пора валить — вместе с названным братом Микой и всей «семьей Хьякуя», группой детей, выросшей в одном приюте. Конечно, вампиры легко догнали и перебили беглецов, ушел лишь один.   
Выйдя на поверхность, юный Хьякуя понял, что эпидемия кончилась, но мир изменился — кругом разруха, бродят демоны, а кровососы потихоньку расширяют территорию, предлагая жителям «крышу». Власть в Японии захватила семья Хиираги, сформировавшая Имперскую Демоническую армию, которая защищает людей и бьет вампиров зачарованным оружием. Свой путь Юитиро ясен — готовиться к службе, мстить за погибшую родню. Прямого и порывистого парня ждет немало сюрпризов и неожиданностей, но в таком поганом мире лучше надеяться на свой дар и свой меч, чем на волю судьбы и благосклонность правителей!
description.pt-br: Um dia, um vírus misterioso apareceu na Terra e matou todos os humanos infectados com mais de 13 anos. Ao mesmo tempo, vampiros emergiram dos recantos sombrios do mundo e escravizaram a humanidade. Entra Hyakuya Yuuichirou, um menino que, junto com o resto das crianças de seu orfanato, é tratado como gado pelos vampiros. Mesmo em cativeiro, Yuuichirou sonha grande. Ele sonha em matar vampiros. Ele sonha em matar todos eles.

title.en: Summer Pockets Reflection Blue Support Manga

altTitles.ja: Summer Pockets REFLECTION BLUE 応援漫画

description.en:
Summer Pockets story:  
To help manage his recently deceased grandmother's effects, the protagonist Takahara Hairi travels to Torishirojima during his summer vacation. Hairi finds himself starting to adjust to life on this island, surrounded by nature far lusher than anything he has ever come across back in the city. Time seems to flow by casually on this island, and as it does, memories of something nostalgic keep coming back to him… Memories of something he had long forgotten.   
  
This series of short manga chapters by various artists is published for free online to hype up a new release of the visual novel.  
  
Chapter 1 by Hinata Nonoka  
Chapter 2 by Remotaro  
Chapter 3 by Asami Yuriko  
Chapter 4 by ZEN  
Chapter 5 by Ikeda Jun  
  
**Links:**  
- [Original Visual Novel](https://store.steampowered.com/app/897220/Summer_Pockets/) (Steam)
description.vi: Những mẫu manga ngắn để cổ động phát hành Summer Pockets Reflection Blue, do nhiều họa sĩ quen thuộc với kagikko thực hiện. Xuất phát từ visual novel của công ty Key vào năm 2020.

altTitles.en: TONIKAWA: Over The Moon For You

description.en:
Described as a story full of "love" and "dreams", Tonikaku Kawaii follows a protagonist whose name is written with the characters for "Hoshizora" ("Starry Sky" in Japanese), but whose name is pronounced as "Nasa". On the day of his high school entrance exams, Nasa encounters a beautiful girl. For Nasa, it feels like destiny is finally calling out to him that he will have a girl friend, but…

Note: Volume 15 and 16's numberings are correct, as this is how they are in the original.
description.ru:
Тяжело жить, если родители дали тебе имя НАСА - да, как NASA, и каждый второй спрашивает, пойдешь ли ты в астронавты. Еще тяжелее, если в один день тебя собьет грузовик, ты встретишь любовь всей своей жизни и тут же ее потеряешь, согласившись жениться на ней. Мужик сказал, что женится - значит женись. И заверьте… Веселая комедия положений без особой логики, но с неожиданными поворотами сюжета. Ведь жена и правда с Луны?..   
  
**Tonikaku Cawaii is the official romanization.**
description.pt-br: Aceito sair com você se você se casar comigo.

altTitles.ja: ごめんねオカルト遊ばせて？

altTitles.id: Maaf karena membiarkanmu bermain-main dengan ilmu gaib?

description.en: "Occult Research Circle" located at Kyoto Yagi Women's University of Arts. However, research is no longer a convenience; he is just playing around with the occult because it seems interesting. A Reiwa strange story about punishing girls who mess around with the occult just for fun.

altTitles.en: Tougen Anki: Legend of the Cursed Blood

altTitles.fr: Tôgen Anki : La légende du sang maudit

description.en: Ichinose Shiki, an inheritor of the blood of Oni had lived out his entire childhood oblivious to this fact. However, when an unknown man comes rushing into his home in attempts to assassinate him, his foster father finally reveals the truth. In a world where Oni and Momotarou have never been able to coexist, join Ichinose in his struggle for power and unifying the two races!
description.fr:
Une légende raconte qu'un enfant extrêmement fort serait né d'une pêche et baptisé Momotarô. Lorsqu'il devint assez grand et puissant, ce valeureux guerrier aurait chassé les Oni qui pillaient les villages. Ce héros n'est pas une légende... Tout comme les Oni...
Leurs descendants sont encore parmi nous et la bataille opposait le clan Momotarô au clan des Oni fait rage ! Shiki est un jeune garçon, au sang chaud. Alors qu'il vient de se faire renvoyer de l'école, il prend conscience qu'il possède du sang de Oni. Le clan Momotarô le cherche et veut l'éliminer. la quête de liberté de Shiki et des autres Oni commence...
description.pt-br: Ichinose Shiki, um herdeiro do sangue de Oni, viveu toda a sua infância alheio a esse fato. No entanto, quando um homem desconhecido entra correndo em sua casa na tentativa de assassiná-lo, seu pai adotivo finalmente revela a verdade. Em um mundo onde Oni e Momotarou nunca puderam coexistir, junte-se a Ichinose em sua luta pelo poder e unificando as duas raças!

description.en: Vomiting, poisoning, constipation, vaccines, etc., what is going on inside a cat's body at that time! A must-read manga for cat people to live a healthy life with cats!
A fun romantic comedy about two characters having fun in various countries all over the world.

Tomo Aizawa was able to successfully confess to her crush Junichirou Kubota. There is only one problem: He just sees her as his buddy. He thought that she was a boy until they went to middle school together, because her grade school was in a different school district.

altTitles.ru: Приди же в Мир Демонов, Ирума-кун!

altTitles.th: อิรุมะคุงกับโรงเรียนปิศาจ

altTitles.ja: 魔入りました！入間くん

altTitles.id: Selamat datang di sekolah iblis! Iruma-kun

description.en:
Iruma Suzuki, fourteen years old, can’t say no to any request. His irresponsible parents make him work dangerous job after dangerous job to support them, and then one day they sell him to a demon! But, much to his surprise, the demon wants to adopt Iruma as his grandson? Unable to refuse his request, Iruma becomes the grandson of the great demon Sullivan. His new doting demon grandfather enrolls him in Demon School Babyls – where Sullivan is coincidentally the principal. Thus begins Iruma-kun's extraordinary school life among the otherworldly, meeting many colorful demons, taking on daunting challenges, and facing his true self as he rises to become someone great. 

Cozy magical slice of life with occasional urban terrorism.
description.es:
Con una vida bastante desgraciada y unos padres vagos y avaros, Iruma es arrastrado al infierno contra su voluntad después de que estos lo vendan a un demonio. Pero para su sorpresa, la vida que le depara el inframundo es mucho mejor que la que tenía con su familia.

Bajo la tutela de su nuevo dueño, un poderoso, pero solitario demonio que sólo quería cumplir su anhelo de tener un nieto, empieza a asistir a un instituto del que este es director después de firmar cierto contrato con él.

Ahora, Iruma tiene que intentar adaptarse al mundo de los demonios mientras esconde su naturaleza humana y se enfrenta a los distintos desafíos que lo esperan en su nuevo instituto. ¡Su nueva vida demoníaca acaba de empezar!
description.ru: Четырнадцатилетний Судзуки Ирума только что был брошен и продан демону его безответственными родителями! Тем не менее, к своему удивлению, он оказывается теперь живет с демоном, как его приёмный внук. Затем он поступил в школу, где его дед — Салливан, работает в качестве директора. Так начинается необычайная школьная жизнь Ирумы-куна среди потусторонних, встречая много красочных лиц, принимая на себя сложные задачи, и сталкиваясь со своим истинным — я, когда он поднимается, чтобы стать кем-то великим. Уютная волшебная повседневность с случайным городским терроризмом.
description.tr: On dört yaşındaki Iruma Suzuki hiçbir isteğe hayır diyemez. Sorumsuz ailesi, onları geçinmek için onu tehlikeli işlerden tehlikeli işlere koşturtur ve sonra bir gün onu bir iblise satarlar! Ancak iblis, Iruma'yı torunu olarak evlat edinmek isteyince çok şaşırır. Bu isteği reddedemeyen Iruma, büyük iblis Sullivan'ın torunu olur. Yeni sevecen iblis dedesi onu, Sullivan'ın tesadüfen müdürü olduğu İblis Okulu Babyls'e kaydettirir. Böylece Iruma-kun'un diğer dünyadakiler arasındaki sıra dışı okul hayatı başlar; birçok renkli iblisle tanışır, zorlu mücadelelere atılır ve büyük biri olmak için yükselirken gerçek benliğiyle yüzleşir.
description.vi: Mairimashita! Iruma-kun là câu chuyện kể về cậu bé Suzuki Iruma, người đã bị bố mẹ mình kí khế ước bán cho ác ma để đổi lấy tiền tài và bình an. Cậu bé Iruma đáng thương từ lúc mới biết đi (1 tuổi) đã phải "ra xã hội" lăn lộn, buôn ba khắp nơi với hai vị phụ huynh "tưng tửng" cho đến ngày một Ác Ma đến rước cậu đến Ma giới theo khế ước. Tưởng chừng như sắp vào bụng quỷ thì vị Ác Ma già nua này đã khóc lóc yêu cầu cậu làm cháu trai ông ta, với bản tính lương thiện và tốt bụng đến cả bản thân mình cũng phải kinh ngạc, cậu bất đắc dĩ đã đồng ý lời đề nghị đó và nhập học trường Ác Ma theo ý ông ta. Chuyện gì sẽ xảy ra tiếp theo, mời các bạn theo dõi cuộc sống học đường đầy bất thường của Iruma-kun.
description.pt-br:
Iruma Suzuki, de quatorze anos, não pode dizer não a nenhum pedido. Seus pais irresponsáveis ​​o fazem trabalhar em empregos perigosos para sustentá-los, e então um dia eles o vendem para um demônio! Mas, para sua surpresa, o demônio quer adotar Iruma como seu neto?  

Incapaz de recusar seu pedido, Iruma torna-se neto do grande demônio Sullivan. Seu novo avô demônio amoroso o matricula na Demon School Babyls - onde Sullivan é coincidentemente o diretor. Assim começa a extraordinária vida escolar de Iruma-kun entre o outro mundo, encontrando muitos demônios coloridos, enfrentando desafios assustadores e enfrentando seu verdadeiro eu enquanto ele se torna alguém grande.

[ 1° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 7, Cap 44. ]
[ 2° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 11, Cap 94. ]
[ 3° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 17, metade do Cap 147.]

description.en: The beautiful English teacher Momoko Irosaki receives what she thinks are the lustful gazes of her male students every day... or so she misunderstands!? What goes on in the school life of a teacher who inadvertently indulges in fantasies full of allure...?
description.ja: 美人英語教師の色咲先生は、日々男子生徒から思春期真っ盛りの視線を浴びている…のは勘違い!? ついお色気全開の妄想をしてしまう先生の学校生活は――…。ちょっとえっちでかなり笑える妄想スクールコメディ!!
description.ru: Красивая учительница английского Иросаки Момоко, как ей кажется, каждый день ловит на себе похотливые взгляды своих учеников мужского пола... Или она просто неправильно их понимает?! Что происходит в школьной жизни учителя, который невольно предается таким фантазиям?...
description.vi: Irosaki-sensei, một giáo viên trẻ xinh đẹp, hoạt bát,... Nói chung là mặt tiền cô rất  tuyệt với, học sinh đứa nào đứa nấy cũng mê. Nhưng thật ra "mặt trong" của cô lại không được xán lạn đến vậy. Và rồi cô gặp một cậu học trò yêu thích môn tiếng anh mà cô đang giảng dạy, thay vì nghĩ rằng "ồ, siêng quá ta", thì trong đầu cô lại chỉ có vô vàn suy nghĩ đồi trụy rồi tự gán hết lên người cậu học sinh ấy, nói chung là ngây ngô lắm cả nhà XD.

title.en: Gal to Iinchou ga Guuzen Saikai suru Hanashi

altTitles.ja: ギャルと委員長が偶然再会する話

altTitles.ja-ro: Gyaru to Iinchou ga Guuzen Saikai suru Hanashi

altTitles.en: A Story about a Gal and a Committee Chairwoman Who Meet Again by Coincidence

altTitles.pt-br: A história de uma gal e uma presidente de comitê que se reencontram por acaso

altTitles.es: Una historia sobre una gal y una presidenta de comité que se reencuentran por coincidencia

description.en: After finishing her errands, Marina heads for the bus stop on her way home. However, there she runs into the drunken former committee chairwoman from her high school days. She thinks she doesn't remember her, but while she's taking care of her, she says to her, "You used to avoid me...," which is very meaningful to her...?

"I've been cheating on you. Oh, and it's not just one guy. It's three. Sorry about that."

Back in middle school, Akiyoshi Sunao's first-ever girlfriend shattered his heart, and he swore off love. However, all that changes when he develops a crush on a girl in his university's film club. Just as he's finally beginning to move on from the past, he bumps into his ex-girlfriend. Little does he know that this is only the beginning...

To his horror, he wakes up in her body the next morning!
description.ja: 「実は4股してるの　ごめんね」。中学時代、人生で初めての彼女にヒドイ振られ方をした秋吉直（あきよしすなお）。「もう誰かを好きになることなんてない」と思っていたが、大学生となり映画サークルの先輩・小河原菜摘（こがはらなつみ）に惹かれ始める。しかし、そんな折に元カノ・西川檸檬（にしかわれもん）と再会。しかも翌朝目が覚めると、身体が入れ替わっていて…!?
description.es-la: "Te he estado engañando. Ah, y no es sólo un chico. Son tres. Lo siento". En la secundaria, la primera novia de Akiyoshi Sunao le destrozó el corazón y renunció al amor. Sin embargo, todo eso cambia cuando se enamora de una chica en el club de cine de su universidad. Justo cuando finalmente comienza a dejar atrás el pasado, se topa con su exnovia. Lo que no sabe es que esto es sólo el comienzo... ¡Para su horror, se despierta en su cuerpo a la mañana siguiente!
description.pt-br: "Eu tenho te traído. Ah, e não é apenas um cara. São três. Desculpe por isso." De volta ao ensino médio, o primeiro amor de Akiyoshi Sunao despedaçou seu coração, e ele jurou evitar o amor. No entanto, tudo muda quando ele se apaixona por uma garota no clube de cinema da universidade. Justo quando ele está começando a superar o passado, ele esbarra com sua ex-namorada. Mal sabe ele que isso é apenas o começo... Para seu horror, ele acorda no corpo dela na manhã seguinte!

title.en: The Great Villain Senior Brother and All of His Yandere Junior Sisters

altTitles.zh: 反派大师兄，师妹们全是病娇

altTitles.zh-ro: Fǎnpài Dà Shīxiōng, Shīmèimen Quán Shì Bìng Jiāo
Fanpai Da Shixiong, Shimeimen Quan Shi Bing Jiao

altTitles.en: The Big Villain Brother and the Junior Sisters Are All Sick and Delicate
The Great Villain Senior Brother and All of His Yandere Junior Sisters

altTitles.es-la: El Gran Villano Hermano Mayor y todas sus Hermanas Menores Yandere

description.en:
Lin Xiao became Villain senior Brother of the Qinglan Sect after Reincarnation!

As long as you follow the plot of the original book, and become a Evil villain, you can become a God and ascend to heaven!

Even if he is suffering he had no choice but to tease the fourth junior sister, steal the clothes of the third junior sister, pour some strong medicine into the second junior sister’s water, and conscientiously perform the villain’s duties.
And Finally made it to the day when the male protagonist became a teacher!

Lin Xiao was very excited and prepared to poison the male lead. According to the plot, he will be caught by several junior sisters and thrown by the male lead.

He did not expect......
- - -
Second Junior Sister: My Eldest Senior Brother is still so kind, how can this bit of poison be enough! Look at me!

Third Junior Sister: I'll kill Ye Chen, and kidnap my Senior Brother! He is mine alone!

Fourth Junior Sister: I'll kill everyone... Create a world where there is only my Senior Brother!

Beautiful Master: He's so cute, poisoning behind his back, he really deserves to be called my good disciple.

Lin Xiao: (⊙ˍ⊙) You all should read the script! It's me who should be killed!

A relaxed and joyful anti-routine fairy tale.

altTitles.ja: ペンションライフ・ヴァンパイア

description.en: Vampires and werewolves... One day, Eri, a "revision officer" who hunts down things that are said to resent mankind, wanders into a pension run by a mysterious girl. The encounter between a girl whose existence was denied and a legendary vampire. She won't change the world, but she can become kind. A heartwarming house administration comedy begins now!
description.ja: 人類を脅かす怪物たち“カタラレ”と戦う改訂官（リライター）のエリ。しかし突然の終戦により普通の女子高生として暮らす事に！　学校生活に馴染めないエリは街中で吸血鬼（ヴァンパイア）の少女を見かけ、跡をつけてみると少女が経営するペンションに客として迎えられ…!?
description.es-la: Vampiros y hombres lobo... Un día, Eri, una "oficial de revisión" que caza cosas que se dice resienten a la humanidad, entra en una pensión dirigida por una chica misteriosa. El encuentro entre una chica cuya existencia era negada y un vampiro legendario. Ella no cambiará el mundo, pero puede volverse amable. ¡Una conmovedora comedia sobre administración de viviendas comienza ahora!

description.en: ‘Meok Gwi-Sa’ is a Monster Hunter who eats monsters to protect the human world. After the release of the Hell demon, he lost his power. He managed to survive and met Goyoung. Goyoung, is a young individual with a petite build, who has endured a lifetime of torment due to his physical stature. His childhood friend, Kang Jong-bo, suddenly transforms into a bully during high school. However, their lives take an unexpected turn when Goyoung acquired a mysterious power which is the ability to devour monsters. Goyoung embarks on a perilous journey to protect humanity from the impending threat of the Gate to Hell. Will he be able to control his new powers and save the world from its impending doom?

the Grand Hybrid, born from the union of angels and demons, is believed to possess the highest lineage among hybrids. When awakened, this extraordinary being, known as the ‘Apex Hybrid’, is said to have the power to blow up the universe.

Contrary to Jake’s desire for a simple and ordinary life, angels and devils eventually seek him out as the ultimate ‘Apex Hybrid’. They employ various strategies to convince him to join their respective sides.

title.en: The Ending, I Want to Change it

description.en: Byun Soo-ah, an impoverished novelist who only writes bad endings, is possessed by someone's curse as Choi Se-hwa, the villainess of 'End of Youth', which is currently being serialized. Can Su-ah survive and return to her original world in a novel full of traitors, sociopaths, double personalities, and psychopaths?

altTitles.en: The Constellation That Returned From Hell

altTitles.ja: 地獄から蘇った聖座様

description.en:
One fateful day, a mysterious place called the Abyss, which is full of celestials and monsters, appeared on Earth. These celestials from the Abyss required the faith of believers to maintain their power, making Earth and its great population a jackpot for them.

Unfortunately, among the good celestials who handed out blessings to humans in return for their faith, there were evil celestials who preferred to use more powerful means to just take over Earth.

Yeonseung Choi is one of the many hunters on Earth who protect people from the threat of the dungeons and the monsters that come from the Abyss. However, he is obsessed with training and becoming stronger, to the point that a celestial has a vision of him saving Earth from a calamity involving demonic celestials swallowing up Earth whole. Thus, she makes a contract with him to have him train and become the hero from her vision.

Will Yeonseung really be able to endure the arduous training in the Abyss and return to Earth to save it?

description.ja:
数多の「聖座」とモンスターが潜む、混沌の無限空間「アビス」。そんなアビスと繋がった地球。 神のような存在の聖座の中には、武力を持って地球を支配しようとする邪悪な者も存在した。 しがないハンターの一人だった斎条翔（さいじょう しょう）は聖座たちから地球を守るため、女神と契約をすることに。ところが、修行場に向かった翔はひょんな流れで魔力の嵐に巻き込まれアビスに放り出されてしまい…!? 果たして翔は無事地球を守り切れるのか!? 超努力型の武功使いの「聖座」物語が今、始まる！

description.ko:
성좌들이 노리는 땅, 지구.
헌터 최연승은 지구를 독식하려는 성좌들을 막아내고자 특별 수련에 돌입하기로 한다. 

수련 장소는 시간이 무한히 느리게 흐르는 공간 어비스. 
허나 최연승은 갑자기 마력폭풍에 휘말리고,  
급기야 거친 어비스를 정면으로 마주하게 되는데. 

어비스 곳곳에서 전례없이 무한한 실전 수련을 거친 최연승은 
인간 최초로 성좌가 되는 실마리를 발견한다. 

노력형 헌터 최연승은 과연 무사히 성좌로 거듭나, 
성좌들의 먹이가 될 운명인 지구를 구할 수 있을 것인가?

노력형 먼치킨 무공 수련자 최연승.
그가 걷는 인간 최초의 성좌가 되는 길!

description.en: Hiromi Sonoda has no girlfriend, no job, and no home, until he finds a shared-house with very cheap rent and goes to check it out. However, the share-house has a certain condition... Kei Sasuga presents a new "Share House Romantic Comedy"!
description.fr:
Hiromi Sonoda n'a plus de petite amie, plus de travail et plus de maison, jusqu'à ce qu'il trouve une colocation au loyer très bon marché et qu'il aille la visiter. Cependant, la colocation est soumise à certaines conditions...
Kei Sasuga présente sa nouvelle "Share House Romantic Comedy" !
description.id: Hiromi Sonoda tidak punya pacar, tidak punya pekerjaan, dan tidak punya rumah, sampai dia menemukan rumah kos-kosan dengan harga sewa yang sangat murah dan pergi untuk melihatnya. Namun, rumah kos-kosan memiliki syarat tertentu... Kei Sasuga menghadirkan "Komedi Romantis Rumah Kos-kosan" baru!
description.ja: 「幸せな家庭」を夢見る園田寛美は、職を失い同棲中の彼女に振られて、家ナシ金ナシ彼女ナシに…。そんなときに、間違えて入居したのが、なんと女性専用シェアハウスだった!!
description.pt-br: Hiromi é um homem que sempre sonhou em ter uma família calorosa e amorosa por causa de um incidente em seu passado. Entretanto, depois que sua namorada terminou com ele por várias razões, ele começa a desistir de seu sonho e pensa que nunca será capaz de realizá-lo. Sem um lugar para viver, ele chega a uma casa compartilhada cheia de mulheres. Será que ele vai encontrar o lar e a família que ele almeja neste novo lugar?

title.en: Screw the Noble Life, I’m Going Home

altTitles.en: Noble Lady or Whatever, I'm Going Home

altTitles.es-la: Dama noble o lo que sea, yo me voy a casa

description.en:
After confirming that I had won the lottery, I tried to quit my job! However, as soon as I opened the door, I found myself transmigrated into the body of a noble lady. I have one year to claim the prize money, so I have to return home at all costs. Please wait for me, my 1.7 million won! Mum will be there soon, but... What's wrong with this family?!

"I love you." But I'm not your daughter!

"Sister, you might get hurt so I'll hold you." Did he mean he would lift me? What is this guy, a giant brown bear?

"If you mess with our sister one more time, I'll make you disappear without a trace." He's got a pretty face, but he has a sharp tongue.

"Don't fall ill." Don't worry about me. Why are there so many of them?! I'm not a noble lady! Leave me alone, I wanna go home!

'Sejong's secret weapon, Shadow Unit informer.'
Gwiyoung, called the Ghost's Shadow, has been wandering around the battlefield since childhood.
Vowing to get revenge, he decided to become a member of the nation's best special forces as an informer.

Baili Jin, a fairy who was living in heaven, eating and drinking without a care, broke her Majesty’s colourful, stained-glass plate at her birthday and got banished to the mortal realm. Now she has to begin her adventures in the mortal realm with all of her spiritual powers gone! In order to survive, the former fairy has to deliver take-out….  
  
An endearingly silly fairy, a gentle restaurant manager, a reserved top student and a hard to resist yandere onee-san (kind on the outside, dark/possessive on the inside) , let the story of their beautiful friendship and youthful days begin!  
  
Author's weibo: [@Viva喂娃酱](https://weibo.com/vivaandjulys)   
Artist's weibo: [@Julys橘奶司](https://weibo.com/julys0723)
description.pt-br: Bai Lijin, uma fada que vivia no céu, comendo e bebendo sem se preocupar, quebrou o colorido vitral de Sua Majestade em seu aniversário e foi banida para o reino mortal. Agora ela tem que começar suas aventuras no reino mortal sem todos os seus poderes espirituais! Para sobreviver, a ex-fada tem que entregar comida… Uma fada carinhosamente boba, uma gentil gerente de restaurante, uma aluna reservada e uma garota de duas caras difícil de resistir, que comece a história de sua bela amizade e juventude!

description.en:
Daily Chaldea is an unofficial daily slice-of-life fancomic created using art assets from the game Fate/Grand Order and building upon the existing lore of the franchise.

The story follows the adventures of genderswapping protagonist Ritsuka Fujimaru and the many Servants they've summoned, with the tone ranging from comedic to philosophical. The comic is 'live' with the NA server of Fate/Grand Order, with new characters appearing in the comic around the time they appear in the game and comics often referencing recent events in the game.

Enjoyment of this comic relies heavily upon the reader's familiarity with the game and its characters, so the author recommends playing Fate/Grand Order before reading this comic.

---

This comic is being uploaded to MangaDex by reader request and with the approval of MangaDex staff. All art is copyright TYPE-Moon / FGO Project, Aniplex Inc., Lasengle, and other copyright holders as appropriate. This comic is not for profit (through ad revenue or otherwise).

Some early use the original white backgrounds. Later comics have darker backgrounds and additional art assets for improved quality.

A slum where criminals' descendants live... People beyond the border look down and discriminate them as "tribal people." Ludo, an orphan boy, lives in the slum with his foster parent, Legt, and makes a living using his extraordinary physical abilities. However, one day, he was accused for a crime he didn't commit., and is thrown into the "abyss" which even the slum people fear.

---
Living in the slums of a wealthy town, Rudo and his foster father Legto try to coexist with the rest of the town's residents, but Rudo despises the wastefulness of the upper class. Ignoring the warnings from those around him, Rudo regularly rummages through the town's garbage in search of anything useful or valuable to save from the "Abyss"—a massive hole where anything considered trash is dumped, including people. Rudo's biological father was one such person, having been thrown into the Abyss after he was accused of murder.

One day, after running into a mysterious figure on the way home, Rudo returns to find Legto's dying body on the floor. He is immediately found at the scene by the authorities and is charged with murder. No one believes his claims of innocence, and he is thrown into the Abyss. Instead of dying, however, he finds himself in a strange, foul-smelling place surrounded by monsters made out of trash.

When Rudo is attacked by said monsters, he is saved by a man named Engine, who reveals himself to be a "janitor"—someone who uses special weapons called "jinkis" to combat these creatures. In order to get his revenge on the one who killed Legto, Rudo reluctantly becomes a janitor to fight his way back up and out of the Abyss.

---
**Links:**

description.id:
Di daerah kumuh dimana keturunan kriminal tinggal... orang-orang yang di luar perbatasan mendiskriminasi dan merendahkan mereka sebagai "orang suku.". rudo, anak yatim, yang tinggal di daerah kumuh dengan orang tua angkatnya, regto, dan bertahan hidup menggunakan kemampuan fisik hebatnya. bagaimanapun, suatu hari, dia dituduh melakukan kejahatan yang dia tidak lakukan, dan dilempar ke dalam "abyss" yang bahkan orang-orang di daerah kumu bahkan ditakuti.'
Tinggal di daerah kumuh dari kota makmur, Rudo dan ayah angkatnya regto mencoba untuk bersahabat dengan orang-orang kota, tapi rudo membenci borosnya orang kelas atas. mengabaikan peringatan dari sekitarnya, Rudo mengais sampah melalui tempat pembuangan kota untuk mencari barang-barang bernilai atau berguna untuk diselamatkan dari "abyss"- lubang besar dimana apapun yang dianggap sampah dibuang ke sana, termasuk manusia. Ayah kandung Rudo termasuk orang itu, yang dilempar ke dalalm Abys setelah dia difitnah melakukan pembunuhan.
Suatu hari, setelah lari dari sesosok misterius saat jalan pulang, Rudo menemukan tubuh sekarat Regto terbaring di lantai. dia dengan segera ditemukan di tkp oleh petugas dan dijatuhi dengan pembunuhan. Tidak seorangpun percaya ketidak bersalahannya, dan dia dilempar ke Abyss. Alih-alih mati, dia menemukan dirinya di tempat aneh, dan berbau busuk yang dikelilingi oleh monster yang terbuat dari sampah.
Ketika rudo diserang oleh monster itu, dia diselamatkan oleh pria yang bernama enjin, yang menyebut dirinya sebagai "janitor"- seseorang yang menggunakan senjata spesial yang disebut "jinki" untuk melawan makhluk itu. Agar dapat balas dendam pada orang yang membunuh Regto, Rudo dengan enggan menjadi seorang janitor untuk dapat kembali ke atas dan keluar dari Abyss.
description.ja: 犯罪者の子孫たちが暮らすスラム街。境界線の向こうの人々からは「族民」とさげすまれ、差別を受けていた。孤児だった少年・ルドは、育ての親であるレグトと共にスラム街に住み、常人離れした身体能力を武器に生計を立てていた。だがある日、身に覚えのない罪を着せられ、スラムの人々でさえ恐れる「奈落」へと落とされてしまう……。
description.es-la:
Barrios marginales habitados por descendientes de delincuentes. La gente de fuera de la frontera los desprecia y discrimina como "gente de la tribu". Ludo, un niño huérfano, vive en el barrio bajo con su padre adoptivo Legto, y se gana la vida utilizando sus extraordinarias habilidades físicas. Sin embargo, un día es acusado de un crimen que no cometió y se ve abocado al "abismo" que hasta los habitantes de los barrios bajos temen.

(Source: Pocket Magazine)
description.pt-br: O grito redundante da alma que vem do fundo do poço em direção ao mundo infestado pelo desprezo e segregação! O subúrbio onde vivem os descendentes dos criminosos. Mesmo assim o Ludo vivia em meio à esse ambiente, de cabeça erguida, mas......!?

description.en: Dokja was an average office worker whose sole interest was reading his favorite web novel 'Three Ways to Survive the Apocalypse.' But when the novel suddenly becomes reality, he is the only person who knows how the world will end. Armed with this realization, Dokja uses his understanding to change the course of the story, and the world, as he knows it.
description.es:
En ese entonces, Dokja no tenía idea de que su novela web favorita, Tres maneras de sobrevivir al apocalipsis, cobraría vida y que solo él sabría cómo iba a terminar el mundo. Tampoco tenía idea de que se convertiría en el protagonista de esta novela transformada en realidad. Ahora Dokja debe embarcarse en un viaje para alterar el curso de la historia y salvar a la humanidad de una vez por todas.

「ありえない...これは俺が知っている展開だ。」 10年以上読み続けた小説の最終話を読んだ日、世界は滅亡し小説の世界が現実となった。 平凡で冴えないサラリーマンの主人公・ドクシャ。 そんな彼の趣味はWEB小説『滅亡した世界で生き残る３つの方法』を読むこと。 ついに最終話を読み終えたかと思いきや、作者からのメッセージが届き小説のモンスターと登場人物が突如現れ、新たな世界が幕を開けた！ 「俺は、この世界の結末を知る唯一の読者となった。」 たった一人だけが読み終えたファンタジー小説が現実に。 果たしてドクシャは滅亡した世界を救うことができるのか？

description.en: Ling Qi, a mischievous rabbit spirit, stole the Celestial Emperor's prized carrots and was punished with trials across three thousand lesser realms. In each realm, he diligently cosplays various roles, from pervert to villain, with one goal: sabotage the central couple! However, despite his intentions not to seduce anyone, his attempts often fail. As the trials progress, Ling Qi realizes that everything was manipulated by the Celestial Emperor…

Tae, a beautiful 17-year-old girl, and Kotaro, a serious office worker. These two seemingly happy people have a secret they can't reveal to anyone - the rival ninjas of Iga and Kouga secretly live together in this laid-back romantic comedy!
description.ja: 17歳の美少女・たえと、まじめな会社員の小太郎。一見幸せそうに見える二人には誰にも言えない秘密があった――伊賀・甲賀のライバル忍者がこっそり同棲生活を送る、まったりラブコメ！
description.pt-br: Tae, uma linda garota de 17 anos, e Kotaro, um sério trabalhador de escritório. Essas duas pessoas aparentemente felizes têm um segredo que não podem revelar a ninguém - os ninjas rivais de Iga e Kouga vivem secretamente juntos nesta comédia romântica descontraída!

altTitles.en: Ugly Duckling of the Entertainment District

altTitles.vi: Cô nàng xấu xí ở Phố Đèn Đỏ

altTitles.en: An Unsightly Girl of a Red Light District

description.en:
An abandoned high school girl becomes an Oiran in a strange world—

Esora, a high school girl who lost her place, found herself in an unknown red light district.
She was sold to a slave buyer at the Yukaku "Sagamiya".
The owner, Sagami, told her that Ishe could be the number one Oiran there.
description.ja:
居場所を失った女子高生エソラは、気がつくと知らない花街にいた。
人買いに売られやってきたのは、遊郭「相模屋」。
その主人である相模に、ここで1番の花魁になれると言われ―。
幻想的な世界観で描かれる異世界花魁物語。
description.vi:
Một nữ sinh trung học bị bỏ rơi trở thành Oiran (kỹ nữ cao cấp) ở một thế giới xa lạ—
Esora, một nữ sinh trung học bị mất chỗ ở, thấy mình đang ở một khu đèn đỏ vô danh. Cô bị bán cho một người mua nô lệ ở Phố đèn đỏ "Sagamiya". Người chủ, Sagami, nói với cô rằng nếu cô trở thành Oiran thì sẽ có thể làm lại cuộc đời.

description.en: Playing Dumb Sterella Brother vs Beautiful, Strong, Miserable White Dragon Brother. Top Omegan white dragon Shou Yue killed the mafia boss, Si Xian, but saved his only son -- Si Mojue, and raised him like a younger brother. Unbeknownst to him, Si Mojue was an Alpha Sterella, only playing the part of a nice brother in front of Shou Yue, doing his best to become the person closest to him to avenge his father's death... An avenger, a murderer, and when the secret is revealed, what will they do?

The Fierce Demons pride themselves as being the reigning delinquent gang of Mikado High School, but their name lets on much more, as they are being influenced by strange occult forces.
Dan Hayato, a mysterious transfer student with an unknown past, arrives at the school with a hidden agenda. With his power to separate his soul from his body, what does he know about the motives of the Fierce Demons and what events will lead to the destruction of the school?
description.ja: 帝高校夜間部のアイドル、氷河めぐみが、謎の老婆ミス・ヴァージン率いる黒門高校によって拉致された！彼女を救うために教師が招いたのは、檀隼人という謎の転校生。めぐみ奪還に動き出す隼人だったが、その役目は我らにこそあり、と帝高護衛団「烈鬼」も動き出す。果たして彼女を救いだすのは――？

description.en: Gannet used to be perfectly normal. Sure, he was stuck in a homophobic hellhole in the middle of nowhere, but he was normal. Then he woke up one morning to find a freakish set of wings sprouting from his back. With no one but his wannabe ornithologist neighbor, Bailey, to confide in, Gannet now must go through the painful and bloody process of growing wings.

title.en: Ore dake Fuguu Skill no Isekai Shoukan Hangyakuki ~Saijaku Skill "Kyuushuu" ga Subete o Nomikomu made~

altTitles.ja: 俺だけ不遇スキルの異世界召喚叛逆記～最弱スキル【吸収】が全てを飲み込むまで～

altTitles.en: I'm the Only One with a Failure of a Skill in Another World's Summoning Rebellion: Until the Weakest Skill [Absorption] Swallows Everything
I'm the Only One with Unfavorable Skills: Isekai Summoning Rebellion

description.en:
Nakatani Yuto, a high school student, and his classmates are suddenly summoned to another world as “heroes.

While his classmates are given powerful skills, Yuto is given the unfortunate skill of [Absorb]. Yuto, who inds no use for it, is mortally wounded in a battle with a demon, but his classmates leave him to die.

But at that moment, Yuto hears a voice out of nowhere...?
description.ja:
高校生の中谷夕斗は突然クラスメイトと共に異世界へ「勇者」として召喚されてしまう。

クラスメイト達が強力な技能（スキル）を授かるなか、ユウトが授かったのは不遇スキル【吸】であった。 使い物にならないユウトは魔物との戦闘で致命傷を負うが、クラスメイトは彼を見殺しに…。

その瞬間、ユウトにはどこからともなく“声”が聞こえて…!?

altTitles.ja: スーパーボールガールズ

description.en: Ichiyoshi continues to work at a chocolate factory, locking away his "best" in his heart. One Christmas night, on his way home, he finds a mysterious superball that rolls out of the darkness...

title.en: Otaku-kun no Seiheki wo Isshou Yugamete Iku Ishuzoku Musume-tachi

altTitles.ja: オタク君の性癖を一生歪めていく異種族娘たち

altTitles.ja-ro: Otaku-kun no Seiheki wo Isshou Yugamete Iku Ishuzoku Musume-tachi

altTitles.en: Interspecies Girls Who Will Twist Otaku-kun's Fetishes for the Rest of His Life

altTitles.ru: Девушки иных рас, пожизненно искажающие сексуальные предпочтения Отаку-куна

description.en:
The main character, Otaku-kun, is awakened to his special sexual proclivities through a series of happening interactions with girls of different races!

Can you keep your reason?
description.ja: 主人公のオタク君を特殊性癖に目覚めさせてしまう、異種族娘たちとのハプニング交流の数々！君は理性を保つことができるか!?

altTitles.ja: ナイトメア・メーカー

altTitles.ja-ro: Sekai wa Subete Kimi no Mono

description.en: Uchida is a high school student genius who created a device that is supposed to make people have good dreams but he always had bad dreams when he tried it on himself. One day, he caught the school doctor sleeping at the clinic and decided to try the device on her. It turned out that it works surprisingly well on her and that she wanted to buy the device from him. He then tries it on his classmates and it became quite popular with the rest of the class as people start lining up to borrow it. Meanwhile, there is growing concern that users of the device are starting to have difficulties differentiating dreams from reality…
description.ja: 天才発明家高校生の内田は､夢に願望を投影できる夢見装置を開発｡誰もが装置の虜になっていく､レム催眠誘導型リアル体感システム始動!!

altTitles.ja: 上杉くんは女の子をやめたい

altTitles.en: Uesugi-kun Wants to Quit Being a Girl

description.en: Uesugi-kun is a boy who's as petite and cute as a girl. He has a crush on a girl he's known since childhood, but overheard her saying, "Wouldn't Uesugi be totally adorable if he was a girl?!" Uesugi-kun's not as tall as his other childhood friend, Eito, nor is he as good at studies, and now he's suffering from a broken heart. A depressed Uesugi-kun stops by a shrine while running an errand and makes a wish... A love-triangle romantic comedy featuring an overly cute, and now female, protagonist begins!

Even angels give into temptation. Once God’s right-hand warrior, the archangel Agnes has succumbed to desire and formed a contract with Lucifer, the ruler of demons. Now a fallen angel, she poses as a simple taxi driver and patrols the bustling city of Seoul during the midnight hours. Cursed by the king of hell to seek souls for her life force, Agnes pursues depraved individuals who prey upon innocents for their own pleasure, and uses their carnal desires against them. But when her past comes back to haunt her, a tantalizing game of cat and mouse involving vengeful entities ensues.
At the market, a man stumbles upon a particularly arrogant slave...
description.pt-br: No mercado, um homem se depara com uma escrava particularmente arrogante...

description.en:
_The secret between me and her is trivial yet important._

Hajime Takahashi, enrolled in Shuubi High School solely because it's the sacred place of his favorite manga. Everywhere in the school are locations that appeared in the manga, and he's super excited! Amidst this excitement, Takahashi meets a beautiful girl, Yayoi Kurokawa, who looks just like the heroine from his favorite work, and they come to share a certain secret. 

This awkward duo weaves a sweet and tangy youth romantic comedy that will make you grin!
description.ja: 僕と彼女の秘密は、些細だけど大切で。大好きな漫画の聖地、それだけが理由で秀美高校に入学した主人公・高橋一。学内はどこに行っても作品に出てきた聖地だらけで大興奮！そんな中、高橋は大好きな作品のヒロインそっくりな美少女・黒川弥生と出会い、とある秘密を共有することに――。不器用な2人が織りなす甘酸っぱくて、ニヤニヤしちゃう青春ラブコメ‼

altTitles.vi: Fǎn Pài Tā Bèi Pò Dāng Tuán Chǒng

altTitles.en: He, the Villain, Is Forced to Be the Favorite One

description.en: A car accident transported Bai Zi'an into the world of "The Ruler of the Empire," an interstellar novel. There, System 66 told him that, in order to return to reality, he would have to play a dumb villain who frequently gets crushed by the novel's main character. Bai Zi'an is supposed to be cannon fodder, but somehow the Prince, the General, and even the main character are all falling over themselves just to woo him. Unbeknownst to him, Bai Zi'an is becoming a beloved character in the novel's world.

Shin Jae-Won attended the World Camp hosted by the Spanish King as a tennis player in his Junior Year.  
  
Jae-Won meets Javier, an unusually conspicuous participant in the World Camp.  
  
“When are we going to practice?”  
  
There are always people (especially women) around him.  
  
Then, Jae-Won, who happened to stumble upon Javier one night during practice, ended up spending the night alone. The more he faced his whimsical, pure side, the more his heart began to beat…  
  
“I hate this kind of things…”  
  
Jae-Won’s first love ended as fast as a Siesta.  
  
A decade later, they meet again Spain.

“I’ve recently come to like someone. He’s my classmate.”  
The short and sweet snapshots of a blossoming romance between two unsuspecting students! Packed with fluffy interactions between adorable (not to mention handsome!) characters, this series is sure to satisfy your sweet tooth~
description.fr: Les chassés croisés entre un garçon et une fille attirés l'un par l'autre en de courts moments. Tendre et amusant.Portuguese (BR) / Português (BR)Os cruzamentos entre um menino e uma menina que são atraídos um pelo outro em breves momentos. Se apaixonando lentamente…
description.it:
L'incrocio tra un ragazzo e una ragazza attratti l'uno dall'altra in pochi istanti. Si innamorano lentamente…..  
  
**Buy the official Vol. 1 on [Taobao](http://t.cn/A6bZZMgM)!**
description.kk:
«Мен сыныптасыма ғашық болып қалдым». 
«Мен бір қызға қызығушылық таныта бастадым». 
Бір-біріне жасырын ғашық болған сыныптастары туралы сүйкімді оқиға 
\ / (^ o ^) \ /
description.uk:
«Нещодавно мені дехто сподобався. Він мій однокласник».
Мила історія про двох, таємно закоханих одне в одного, студентів!
description.vi:
Thời học sinh bạn đã bao giờ crush ai chưa?
Cậu bạn cùng bàn?
Lớp trưởng học giỏi?
Hay một anh khóa trên điến trai?

Chắc hắn rất nhiều người trong chúng ta đều từng có một thời thầm thương trộm nhớ ai đó. Giống như cô bạn nhỏ nhắn Bách Linh và cậu hot boy An Dư Triết thầm thích nhau mà không hay vậy.

"Yêu thâm" là câu chuyện tuổi mới lớn với những ngại ngùng, quan tâm vô tình và ghen tuông nho nhỏ, khiến màu sắc cuộc sống của đôi bạn trẻ trở nên tươi đẹp và muôn màu hơn. Đồng thời bộ truyện cũng giúp người đọc trải nghiệm những cung bậc cảm xúc ngọt ngào, lãng mạn, đôi khi trầm lắng nhưng lại ngây ngô ngốc nghếch của cả hai.
description.pt-br:
Recentemente comecei a gostar de alguém. Ele é meu colega de classe.”
Os instantâneos curtos e doces de um romance florescente entre dois estudantes desavisados! Embalado com interações fofas entre personagens adoráveis ​​(para não mencionar bonitos!), esta série certamente satisfará seu desejo por doces

altTitles.ja: アンデッドアンラック
アンデッドアンラック カラー版

altTitles.vi: Bất tử và bất hạnh (Bản màu)

description.en: Fuuko is an UNLUCKY girl that causes bad luck to anyone she touches. As she prepares to face her death, Andy, an UNDEAD who desperately wants to die appears before her! Realizing her potential, he decides to use Fuuko's power to gives himself a permanent death, but then a certain organization goes after them…

altTitles.ja: シャドーハウス カラー版

description.en:
Faceless shadow nobles living in a vast mansion, attended by living dolls who spend much of their time cleaning up the soot endlessly emitted by their mysterious masters.  
  
Follow the story of Emilyko, a young and cheerful living doll, as she learns her duties serving as the attendant for Kate Shadow-sama. What dangers and dark secrets will she and Kate encounter, as they become more deeply involved in the inner workings of the shadows' society?
description.es:
Nobles sombras sin rostro que viven en una vasta mansión, atendidos por muñecos vivientes que pasan gran parte de su tiempo limpiando el hollín emitido por sus misteriosos maestros.  
  
Sigue la historia de Emilyko, una joven y alegre muñeca viviente, mientras aprende sus deberes como asistente de Kate Shadow-sama.
description.ja: 不思議な洋館に住む、 顔のないシャドー一族と、 世話係の“生き人形”たち。 彼らが織りなす、 摩訶不思議な日常とは…？
description.ru: Безликие теневые дворяне, живущие в огромном особняке, сопровождаемые живыми куклами, которые проводят большую часть своего времени, очищая сажу, бесконечно испускаемую их таинственными хозяевами.
description.es-la: Sombras nobres vivem em uma imensa mansão e são servidos por bonecas vivas que passam a maior parte do tempo limpando a fuligem solta pelos misteriosos mestres. Siga a história de Emilyko, uma boneca viva jovem e animada, enquanto ela aprende seus deveres como serva de Kate Shadow-sama.
description.pt-br: Sombras nobres vivem em uma imensa mansão e são servidos por bonecas vivas que passam a maior parte do tempo limpando a fuligem solta pelos misteriosos mestres. Siga a história de Emilyko, uma boneca viva jovem e animada, enquanto ela aprende seus deveres como serva de Kate Shadow-sama.

description.en: Choi Seon Ha, the top-selling employee at the men's maid cafe 'Moe.' One day, while smoking in the staff-only area, he is illegally filmed. Police aspirant Eun Geon, who works part-time at a nearby convenience store, witnesses the incident by chance and, unable to stand by in the face of injustice, helps Seon Ha out of simple goodwill. In return, Seon Ha invites Eun Geon to the maid cafe where he works, but Eun Geon refuses. After that, Seon Ha visits the convenience store every day, trying to cross the line Eun Geon has drawn, and Eun Geon finds it increasingly difficult to turn away the persistent Seon Ha....

title.en: I, The Invincible Villain Master With My Apprentices

altTitles.zh: 反派师尊的我带着徒弟们天下无敌

altTitles.zh-ro: Fǎnpài Shī Zūn De Wǒ Dàizhe Túdìmen Tiānxià Wúdí
Fanpai Shi Zun De Wo Daizhe Tudimen Tianxia Wudi

altTitles.en: My Villainous Master Brings Along the Peerless Apprentices

altTitles.tr: Ben, Çıraklarımla Birlikte Yenilmez Kötü Ustayım

altTitles.sv: Jag, den oövervinnelige elaka Mästaren och mina lärlingar

description.en: Shen Shi was very disappointed when he transmigrated into the book he wrote and didn't even end up as the protagonist. He also didn’t understand why the invincible hero became a girl? Even worse, why did all his apprentices want to become his wife instead! The protagonist asked him, “Master! Would you like to take me right now? Or do I have to kill off the other apprentices first before you'll have me?”
description.tr: Shen Shi çok üzgündü. Neden yazdığı kitaba gittiğini ve ana karakter olmadığını anlamadı. Ölümsüz erkek ana karakter neden kadındı? Daha bir çok şeyi anlamadı. Çırak yetişimcisi olmak istediği belliydi, bu yüzden herkes onun çırağı olmak istedi. Ana karakter: “Usta! Bugün önce beni mi yiyeceksin, yoksa bütün büyük kız kardeşleri öldürdükten sonra mı beni yemek istiyorsun?”
description.zh: 沈适感觉很难过。 他就不明白了，为什么穿越到了自己写的书里，还不是主角。 他也不明白，龙傲天男主角，为什么变成了女的？ 他更不明白，明明要养成的是徒弟，为什么一个个的都想上位当师娘？ 主角：“师父！你今天是要先吃我呢，还是我干掉所有师姐，你再吃我呢？”

description.en:
Dohwa, Hanyang's best gisaeng, abandons the life of a gisaeng and tries to run away at night with her beloved man. But it was betrayal that came back!
'Why did you...?'
Without knowing why, Dohwa, who was murdered by his hand, fell into the cold water...
But when she opened her eyes, she had become a different person?!
"Madam, have I become a madam?"'
Hong Seo-hye, the main character of a romantic story that made a stir a in the whole city!
"Oh, my God. Oh, my God. I can't believe I'm a high-class lady.'
For a moment, I thought, "Let's get rid of the lowly gisaeng bitch and be loved by handsome husband."
What? Is this couple different from the rumors?
Where are all the stories of your romantic relationship that shook the city, and how come it's so cold?
All right, I don't know what happened, but... I, Dohwa, was the best gisaeng in the world. I'll seduce my husband first!
